scripts.dev-release: systemctl enable nova-vpn-bot-dev && systemctl restart nova-vpn-bot-dev
scripts.dev-stop: systemctl disable nova-vpn-bot-dev && systemctl stop nova-vpn-bot-dev
scripts.pro-release: systemctl enable nova-vpn-bot-pro && systemctl restart nova-vpn-bot-pro
scripts.pro-stop: systemctl disable nova-vpn-bot-pro && systemctl stop nova-vpn-bot-pro
